info.title: InfoQuery
info.description: InfoQuery allows you to automate your business by leveraging your Resware data in a low-code solution. You can view, create, delete and update files, documents, partners, etc.

post.summary: Add New Partner Employee To Partner Company

Enabled.description: Whether or not the new employee has been enabled for use.

WebsiteAccess.description: Whether or not the employee has website access.

UserID.description: The identification number of the new employee.

Name.description: The full name of the employee.

FirstName.description: The first name of the employee.

LastName.description: The last name of the employee.

EmailAddress.description: The email address of the employee.

post.description: Adds a new partner employee to a partner company.

get.description: Get transaction types and product types for fee estimation and placing orders.

FileActionID.description: The identification number of the action.

put.description: Updates an action for a given file. Can update the Action Group ID and start/complete Coordinator Type ID, Partner Type ID, Due Date, Due Date Locked and Done Date Locked. This API call cannot be used to mark an action as started or completed.

DueDate.description: The due date of the action.

DoneDateLocked.description: Whether or not the done date is locked.

StartTask.description: Information regarding the start of the task.

DueDate.description: The due date of the action.

DoneDateLocked.description: Whether or not the done date is locked.

CompleteTask.description: Information regarding the completion of the task.

MWBE.description: Whether or not the partner is a MWBE?
